name: Stelios Kazantzidis
description: '''Stelios Kazantzidis''' ([[Greek alphabet|Greek]]: Στέλιος Καζαντζίδης; 29 August 1931 – 14 September 2001) was one of the most prominent [[Greeks|Greek]] singers. His roots were from [[Pontus (region)|Pontus]] and [[Asia Minor]]. A top artist of Greek music, or [[Laïkó]], he collaborated with many of Greece's foremost composers.
